title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Skills: Mobile Technology-Based Mathematics Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics knowledge and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design collaborative protocols to share math problem-solving processes using mobile technology and social software
Learners can establish real-time feedback systems with peer learners based on guided participation models
Learners can create educational materials explaining complex mathematical theories using mobile technology-based math concept visualization tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
